body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Arthur Turner and the customer's name is Christina Hernandez.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Arthur Turner, and I am with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, I'm Christina Hernandez. I'm looking for some information about your motorcycles.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Christina! We have a fantastic selection of motorcycles. What specific type are you interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm currently feeling overwhelmed by the options. I just want something reliable for commuting.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand; it can be a lot to take in. To help narrow it down for you, could you please share your email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's christina.hernandez at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And could you also provide me with your phone number, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. It's three two three, four five six, seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Christina. I will make sure to reach out to you with the best options based on your preferences.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate that, Arthur. It really helps to have someone guide me through this.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You’re very welcome! Thank you for your time today, Christina. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
